snippet.title: Virtual Karts gameplay (PC Game, 1995)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Virtual Karts, Dos PC game produced by Microprose in 1995 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/virtual-karts/8349/
In this video I am showing off the first race of the game, for a total of three times, as I am trying to get first place but the controls and the complexity of the AI are making it impossible to happen. Overall this is a decent game where u can have a lot of fun.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Super Karts - https://youtu.be/Oucev9oJ5Uo
Manic Karts - https://youtu.be/gyhbbMhColM
Grand Prix Manager 2 - https://youtu.be/74gNp5zciFc
